message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it to be very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still holding out for a bit more. I'm willing to come down to $13500. That's a significant price reduction from my original offer and  still leaves room for you to make a good profit. Let's see if we can find common ground.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $13000. That's the highest I can go.
